Detailed Description

Provides a mysql datasource for webApps Options requred in DataSources. -host -user -password -port -database.

ChangeLog

  • Thur 2:54:14 Aug 27/09 Added a thread pool system to MySqlDataSource. Currently this is configurable with "PoolSize" datasource key
